entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
